name: FOR SALE! Indian Romance Curl
description: 3 Bundles of our Virgin Indian Romance Curl - 14/16/16" for JUST $175!!!  In STOCK, ready to ship or be picked up TODAY!

name: POTW: Peruvian Body Wave
description: Product of the WEEK!!! Our BOSS Collection Peruvian Hair is the ultimate multi purpose hair!  It is extremely soft and ultimately feather light!  You can have up to five bundles of a Peruvian hair installed, yet still maintain a feathery light, maintainable style. It blends very well with most hair textures and is finely textured, less dense and frizzy than Indian and Brazilian hair.  This hair is very luxurious and a customer favorite!  Like all of our other Virgin textures, this hair can be colored, heat styled and chemically altered to your liking.

name: Virgin Brazilian Loose Wave
description: Brazilian hair is the most sought after texture on the market right now.  This texture is used diversely because of its softness, durability and density.  Recommended for most hair types.  Very versatile.  Like all of our Virgin hair, this texture can be colored, heat styled and chemically altered.

name: Virgin Brazilian Deep Wave
description: Our RIPPLE Collection Virgin Brazilian Deep Wave texture is used diversely because of its softness, thickness and durability.  Recommended for blending with THICK hair textures.  Like all of our other Virgin textures, our Brazilian hair can be colored, heat styled and chemically processed!!!

name: Virgin Malaysian Body Wave
description: Our BOSS Collection Malaysian hair has an extremely luxurious feel and is sleek and shiny, but not excessively shiny.  Its luster is low to medium, similar to Brazilian hair.  This hair holds curls extremely well without the use of products.  Its is generally very dark brown, close to black, with some bundles having slightly lighter ends.  This hair blends very well with most hair types.  It does not swell or frizzz in humid conditions making it low in maintenance.  This hair is amazing!  You will love it!

name: Virgin Brazilian Body Wave
description: Our most POPULAR texture blends is very versatile, soft, and luxurious!!!  These cascading waves will turn heads!  This texture is very THICK and is recommended for most hair types.  Like all of our Virgin textures, our Brazilian Body Wave can be colored, heat styled and chemically altered.

name: Brand NEW!!! Virgin European Body Wave
description: Our Brand New Virgin European texture is apart of our PLATINUM Collection.  This hair comes in natural color 613 (High Lift Platinum Blonde) and is our most LUXURIOUS texture!!!  Very soft and silky.  Ideal for trendy colors and the ombre trend, this hair takes color magnificently and can be heat styled and chemically altered to your liking.

name: Silk Based Closure
description: Our Silk Based closure is reinforced and STRONG for long wear and multiple uses.  Available in straight, body wave, loose wave and deep wave.

name: Full Lace Body Wave Wig
description: Our FULL Lace Wigs are durable and absolutely wonderful!  Perfect for someone who has a suffering hairline, alopecia or just for a full look without the hassle of a sew in weave or clip in extensions.  This unit comes in ONE pieces and gives the appearance of a natural scalp ALL OVER!

name: Virgin Brazilian Body Wave Bundles + Lace Closure
description: Our MOST POPULAR texture is always on special for our customers!!!  Choose from one of the combination packages listed and we will ship your hair out to you FREE via USPS!

name: Virgin Brazilian Straight
description: Our BOSS Collection Virgin Brazilian Straight texture is used diversely because of its softness, thickness and durability.  Recommended for blending with THICK hair textures.  Like all of our other Virgin textures, our Brazilian hair can be colored, heat styled and chemically processed!!!

name: Virgin Indian Straight
description: Virgin Indian hair is the most versatile and readily available on the market.  Our BOSS Collection Virgin Indian Straight hair is naturally airy, light and bouncy and can be easily curled and styled.  Indian hair moves effortlessly with minimal products.  Its also blends well with most hair textures.  This hair will swell and become frizzy, just like your natural hair, in humid weather and foggy conditions.  Like all of our other Virgin textures, this hair can be heat styled, colored and chemically altered.

name: Virgin Indian Natural Wave
description: Our BOSS Collection Natural Wave is gorgeous!!!  It is a mix between straight and body wave textures.  Indian hair is the most versatile and readily available on the market. Its also blends well with most hair textures.  This hair will swell and become frizzy, just like your natural hair, in humid weather and foggy conditions. name: Virgin Mongolian Kinky
description:
Our SPLASH Collection Mongolian Kinky hair is perfect for African American natural hair types!!!  Very coarse in texture, this hair is high maintenance!  It must be properly maintained to remain in its most beautiful state.  Moisture, moisture, moisture is KEY for this hair type.  Like all of our other textures, this hair can be colored, heat styled and chemically altered.  

**We recommend wearing this texture in its original state**

name: Full Set Peruvian Body Wave Clip Ins
description: Our ADDICTION Collection custom clip in extensions are a quick and easy way to add length and volume to your natural hair!  We use plastic wig clips instead of metal to ensure your natural hair stays healthy while wearing your clip ins!

name: Full Set Virgin European Clip Ins
description: Our Virgin European extensions our PREMIUM!!!  Included in a full set is 12 Clip In Extensions for length and volume.  Plastic wig clips are used instead of metal to keep your natural hair healthy.

"Savannah" is our BEST SELLING unit from our ADDICTION Collection.  She is a hand constructed U-Part Wig with a durable dome cap.  Wig clips have been added to the "U" for a snug fit, as well as a comb around the perimeter for easy application and removal, with a snug, secure fit!

Like all of our hair, this unit can be heat styled, colored and chemically altered to your liking.
